snippet.title: A Matter of Murder Launch Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A Matter of Murder is a puzzle-mystery game with rogue-like elements for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android. 

One of the guests at an English house party has fallen victim to cold-blooded murder. Your weekend in the country is ruined! What choice have you but to ask your fellow guests probing questions, search the house, draw astonishingly insightful conclusions and solve the crime? The details of each murder are procedurally generated, so “A Matter of Murder” is different every time you play with progressively more challenging logic puzzles. 

www.worthingandmoncrieff.com

FOLLOW A MATTER OF MURDER:

http://www.amatterofmurder.com
https://twitter.com/amatterofmurder/
https://www.facebook.com/MatterOfM
